evidence.text: Person B: Yo, thank you Marcia, you're a sweetheart. And things have been kinda downhill fo r me. She was my favorite person in the world. Shit, I'm sorry.
Person A: I'm so sorry, Benji.
Person A: People will eat you alive if you give them a fuckin inch.
Person B: Marcia Marcia Marcia!   Your country needs you!

Person A: You're very persuasive, Benji.
Person A: No, I'm a fighter.   Gimme a gun.
Person B: Just the creepy feeling of being, like, royalty on this train, you know? Does anyone not see the irony here?
Person A: You know, last year, my daughter married a very rich man-
Person A: -And she can barely have a conversation with any depth anymore. She's lost any perspective on the real world.

Person B: Everyone knows it's sacrilege to put a rock on the north side of a grave.
Person A: Well, that's fine because I'm an atheist.

Person B: Oh, Marcia, I'm sorry, fuck them. I wouldn't miss a week. She was tough on me. She was the only one in the whole fuckin family who would keep me honest. Ev eryone else just disappeared when I needed them most.

Person A: Y ou're a very special person.
Person A: Oh, god, no I'm not. Anyway, you have my information. Send me a picture from your grandma's house. I'm genuinely curious.
